Text: RE Adaytum Invoices Issues Cc Pat I mentioned to Jan that I would provide ETS and other BUs with specific Adaytum project expense coding which has been used for previous training classes She said it didnt matter to her if the business units coded their additional training classes to its own expense account without charging the costs directly to the expense work order which Project Sunrise set up Therefore you do not need to transfer the costs which you have already coded to expense on ETS books Thanks Joe Original Message From Geaccone Tracy Sent Friday October PM To Darensbourg Joe Subject FW Adaytum Invoices Issues Are you going to take care of this Original Message From Prendergast Pat Sent Thursday October PM To Geaccone Tracy Cc Baker Lee Subject FW Adaytum Invoices Issues Tracy Joe Darensbourg called me today asking about some invoices he received from Adaytum for Contributor Administrator and Advanced Analyst training that I am scheduled to take I told him that I had already expensed and sent a check to Adaytum for these two classes He Joe called me later to ask if I had coded this training to one of the Adaytum projects namely an OM project I told him I did not He said he would send me an email with the projects numbers I havent received it as yet Lee wants to be sure that you are aware of this since we dont have any way of monitoring what is coming from Adaytum direct to Enron Thanks Pat Original Message From Baker Lee Sent Thursday October PM To Prendergast Pat Subject Adaytum Invoices Issues Pat Thanks for letting me know about the Adaytum invoice issue that Joe Darensbourg contacted you about I have not been involved in any of the invoicing with Adaytum Tracy Geaccone is handling that for ETS Would you please email Tracy and let her know the particulars of this issue I assume Joe has taken care of it but I would like to keep her in the loop on any cost or invoice issues Thanks Lee Baker Manager Financial Planning ETS Operations Financial Planning

RE Adaytum UpdateBelow is an update on the Adaytum Consolidated Model BU Basic Cubes Training last week two training sessions were held EEOS and EGAS Provided in the training sessions were User Documentation which included screen prints of Manager screens as well as a word document with additional user instructions and screen shots of the data cubes Also included were the Adaytum excel addin reports both summary and financial statements Additional training sessions are scheduled for the next two weeks If you have not done so already please let me know your availability The sessions lasts approximately hours and is done onsite NOTE Most Enron computers have a minimum of K of RAM In order for faster processing of data and accessing the cubes we are recommending that everyone upgrade to an additional K of RAM totalling K RAM The cost of this upgrade is a nominal amount under and is well worth the investment To check the amount of memory on your machine please do the following commands Start Settings Control Panel System Look under Computer for the amount of RAM you have Next Adaytum User Group Meeting we will not have a meeting this week due to accounting close However I will schedule a meeting for next week time and place to be determined Potential topics for discussion are a Plan information input into Adaytum timeline b Training update and c Integration of actual plan data between Adaytum and the Data Warehouse Please forward to me any additional topic you may want to discuss Please call me if you have any comments or other items to discuss Joe

FW of Adaytum ConsultingTraining Days as of August Cc email Tracy FYI see attached excel workbook below Please let me know if you have any comments for ETS Thanks Joe Original Message From Darensbourg Joe Sent Monday August PM To Johnson Jan Frank Mark Cc Fred Ali Email Dennis Upshaw Email Subject RE of Adaytum ConsultingTraining Days as of August Jan Mark FYI Attached is an updated excel workbook which provides the total actual number of Adaytum Consulting Training Days through last Friday August Fred agrees with the total days reflected in the attached schedule Fred also mentioned that if there is any discrepancy in the actual invoices sent to please contact him and he will resolve it Joe
Review Adaytum Model Prior to ReplicationWhen Friday August PM PM GMT Central Time US Canada Where EB
